articles.title: Spokesman for KPA Strategic Force Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Missile Test-Fire against DPRK
articles.content:
Spokesman for KPA Strategic Force Slams Park Geun Hye Group's Missile Test-Fire against DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA) issued a statement on Thursday as regards the Park Geun Hye group's missile test-fire against the DPRK.
					 The Park group on Wednesday conducted the test-fire of missile directly aimed at the DPRK in the Anhung Firing Range of the Thaean peninsula in South Chungchong Province.
					
					 They loudly advertised the test-fire of missile with a range of more than 500 km as a big success.
					
					 Park Geun Hye let loose a spate of outbursts that south Korea has become possible to recover from "military inferiority to the north" by putting all areas of the northern half of Korea within its striking range. Kim Kwan Jin, Han Min Gu and other riff-raffs echoed her utterances. 
					
					 This was part of acts of treachery as it was aimed to hurt the fellow countrymen with arms provided by outside forces, the statement said, adding:
					
					 The Korean nation's history knows no such wicked woman as Park who threw herself to do harm to compatriots with arms provided by outside forces, swishing her skirt to welcome them.
					
					 As Park is ignorant of any military affair, to say nothing of war, the statement brands her as a military dog as she barks as dictated by the U.S. and rushes to the theatre of confrontation with the fellow countrymen under its wire-pulling from the very day she became the boss of Chongwadae ill-famed as a big doghouse of the U.S.
					
					 The prevailing situation proves what wise and just measure the DPRK took to bolster up its deterrence for self-defence pursuant to its line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence and powerful strategic rockets are by no means ones targeting the southern half of Korea where fellow countrymen live.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, chieftain of aggression and war and sworn enemy of the Korean people, their followers and a handful of traitors such as Park Geun Hye are targets of all self-defensive striking means of the DPRK. 
					
					  Park Geun Hye and her group should clearly know that the U.S. projected nuclear war did not break out on this land as the army and people of the DPRK have in place the strongest nuclear deterrent and that the dignity of the country and the nation has been protected and the security of all Koreans guaranteed by the Strategic Force of the KPA capable of turning the U.S. mainland into a sea in flames.
					
					 Sycophancy toward the U.S., worship of it and pursuance of its line only lead to acts of treachery and a dog's death in the long run.
					
					 Park and her party should not forget even a moment that the Strategic Force of the KPA winning one victory after another is taking the lead in the efforts to carry out the just measures of the army and people of the DPRK to bolster up the capabilities for self-defense.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Is Not Entitled to Talk about Dialogue: CPRK Spokesman
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Is Not Entitled to Talk about Dialogue: CPRK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Recently, the south Korean puppet group is behaving so impudently as to noisily trumpet about "dialogue" with the DPRK.
					 Notably, Park Geun Hye lets loose a spate of invectives hurting the social system of the DPRK whenever an opportunity presents itself. She, at the same time, spouts rhetoric urging it to come out for dialogue and not to refuse the south's proposal for dialogue in a bid to mislead the public opinion, creating impression that a dialogue between the authorities of the north and the south has not yet opened due to the DPRK.
					
					 Pursuant to her scenario, Yun Pyong Se, Hong Yong Phyo and other mandarins of the south Korean puppet regime held a series of anti-DPRK confabs with their U.S. and Japanese masters, at which they cried out for "leading the north to dialogue in line with the strategy of pressure and dialogue."
					
					 A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) said in a statement on Wednesday in this regard:
					
					 The above-said moves are no more than renewed politically-motivated chicanery and red herring operation being staged by the puppet group in a sinister bid to shift the blame for the deteriorated north-south relations on to the DPRK, tide over the ever-worsening ruling crisis and escalate confrontation with the DPRK with the backing of outsiders. 
					
					 It is, indeed, the height of impudence for the puppet group to talk about "dialogue" as it has chilled the atmosphere for improving the inter-Korean relations and scuppered the opportunity for dialogue.
					
					 No one will lend an ear to such ill-natured advertisement of "dialogue" by the Park Geun Hye group and it will never be able to evade the responsibility for having deteriorated the north-south relations through such hypocritical burlesque.
					
					 If the puppet group truly wants dialogue with the north, the group should have elementary qualities as a dialogue partner.
					
					 First of all, the group should have the viewpoint to independently solve the reunification issue with the concerted efforts of all Koreans and the stand to recognize and implement the joint declarations agreed upon by the authorities of the north and the south. 
					
					 It should stop toeing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and roll back the policy of confrontation with compatriots in the north and halt at once the north-targeted war drills straining the situation. 
					
					 Only when it does so, can it claim it has elementary qualifications as a dialogue partner and it will have the face to sit together with the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will closely follow what the south Korean puppet group do in practice, not just talking.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Following U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Following U.S. Moves for Bio-chemical Warfare
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in south Korea released a statement on Thursday lashing out at the Park Geun Hye group for conniving at and sheltering the U.S. moves for a bio-chemical warfare against the Korean nation.
					 The statement termed the moves as unpardonable acts of treachery as they are aimed to leave the vital right of the Korean nation to the tender mercy of the U.S. imperialist murderers and a hideous provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have long been engaged in their criminal moves to make the Korean nation victims of their bio-chemical warfare, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. massively introduced large quantities of equipment and huge force for bio-chemical warfare into south Korea from the summer of 2013, the year in which the group of Park, the top class U.S. lackey, took office and undisguisedly staged drills for north-targeted bio-chemical warfare in parallel with nuclear war drills together with the south Korean puppet group.
					
					 The Park group, conspirators in the U.S. imperialists' moves for bio-chemical warfare, is blatantly saying that it would discuss the controversial issue at the "joint meeting" with the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces slated for July under the strong pressure of the opposition parties and civic and public organizations for the "government's" prompt reaction to the introduction of anthrax germs.
					
					 All the facts clearly prove once again that it is impossible to protect the life security of the nation and our fellow countrymen can never escape from the horrible disaster of a nuclear war and bio-chemical warfare as long as the U.S. imperialist aggressors and their shock brigade Park group are allowed to stay in south Korea.
					
					 The Park group keen on bio-chemical warfare against the fellow countrymen in league with foreign forces will not be able to escape from a stern judgment by the nation.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets New Myanmar Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets New Myanmar Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong had a talk with U Thit Linn Ohn, new Myanmar ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Thursday.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Malaysia
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Pak Myong Guk, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, left here on Thursday to participate in a meeting of high-level officials of the ASEAN Regional Forum to be held in Malaysia.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony Held for Construction of Broad-gauge Railroad in Area of Samjiyon
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony Held for Construction of Broad-gauge Railroad in Area of Samjiyon 
 Samjiyon, June 4 (KCNA) -- A broad-gauge railroad from Hyesan to Samjiyon will be constructed.
					 A ground-breaking ceremony took place before the Samjiyon Grand Monument on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were O Su Yong, secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, builders and working people in Samjiyon County.
					
					 The participants laid bunches of flowers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Samjiyon Grand Monument and paid tribute to him.
					
					 O Su Yong made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the construction of the new railroad is a sacred work for glorifying forever the immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the area of Paektu and their revolutionary careers. 
					
					 They called on all builders to wind up the project as scheduled by overcoming hardships and difficulties.

articles.title: Air Clubs to Be Organized in DPRK's Provinces
articles.content:
Air Clubs to Be Organized in DPRK's Provinces
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the Pyongyang City Air Club gave its first glider-flying demonstration performance at the East Pyongyang Stadium in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The performance gave a glimpse of the bright prospect of the club.
					
					 Pyon Jong Ho, head of the club, said:
					
					 Although the club was organized half a year ago, it is planning to contest in upcoming domestic and international games.
					
					 The club is also going to render training services to glider fans.
					
					 Such a kind of club is to be organized in each province, which will be helpful to promote the nation's air sports techniques.
					
					 Air sportspersons will be also trained at Korea University of Physical Education and Central Physical Training College.

articles.title: Sweden's National Day Observed
articles.content:
Sweden's National Day Observed
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Stiernlof Bo Torkel, Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at the Swedish embassy here on Thursday on the occasion of its national day.
					 Present there on invitation were officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Swedish embassy were present.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Russian Delegation
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from a delegation of the Partizansk City, Maritime Territory of Russia.
					 The gift was conveyed to an official concerned on Wednesday by Mayor of the city Aleksandr Zrazhevsky who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Premier League Football Matches of Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Kicks off
articles.content:
Premier League Football Matches of Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Kicks off
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Premier league football matches of the Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize started here on Thursday.
					 It brought together 11 men's football teams and 6 women's football teams.
					
					 The men's football teams are divided into two groups.
					
					 Two best teams from each group will play knock-out games before having finals.
					
					 Meanwhile, women's teams will play league matches.
					
					 The men's contest will last till June 25 while the women's matches will go on till June 26.

articles.title: National Children's Football Contest Closes
articles.content:
National Children's Football Contest Closes
 Wonsan, June 4 (KCNA) -- The second national children's football contest was closed with due ceremony.
					 The finals were held at the Playground of the Songdowon International Children's Camp on June 4.
					
					 The men's team of South Hamgyong Province and the women's team of North Hamgyong Province separately placed first at the contest.

articles.title: KCNA Condemns U.S. Anthrax Germ Experiment
articles.content:
KCNA Condemns U.S. Anthrax Germ Experiment 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency in an indictment released on Thursday vehemently condemned the recent anthrax germ experiment conducted by the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					 This was another grave politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK and an unpardonable act of bringing the dark clouds of bio-chemical warfare to hang over the Korean peninsula, the indictment said, and went on:
					
					 The recent anthrax germ experiment conducted by the U.S. in its air force base in Osan of south Korea was a hideous crime against humanity as it was aimed to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 The anthrax germ called "horrible white powder" and "weapon of evil" is one of the dangerous biological weapons whose killing power is 95 percent.
					
					 It incurs more serious casualties and environmental damage than any other pathogen for its peculiarity.
					
					 In utter disregard of this fact, the U.S. secretly introduced anthrax germs into south Korea for its experiment to seriously threaten the existence of mankind, the worst criminal act to exterminate the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. defined the Korean peninsula as the most dangerous area of germ warfare to estimate the power of killing by anthrax germs. Since 1998 it has conducted experiments after setting up institutes and germ-related facilities in its military bases in Osan, Ryongsan and Phyongthaek, for the first time among its bases overseas.
					
					 The above-said experiment in the Osan military base is part of the bio-chemical warfare the U.S. has so far waged against the Korean nation.
					
					 During the past Korean war the U.S. perpetrated thrice-cursed germ warfare, regarding the Korean peninsula as a ground for testing bio-chemical weapons.
					
					 It even used internationally banned chemical weapons.
					
					 More than 1.23 million people were brutally killed in the northern half of Korea during the war due to the U.S. imperialists' indiscriminate air raids and bio-chemical warfare.
					
					 After the Armistice Agreement was signed, the U.S. has stepped up the moves for bio-chemical warfare against the Korean nation, adding to its crimes. 
					
					 Consequently, south Korea has turned into the world's worst colony and biggest arsenal of bio-chemical weapons as the U.S. shipped all types of nuclear and bio-chemical weapons into south Korea for deliberately conducting tests on living human bodies.
					
					 The above-said anthrax germ experiments in south Korea are heinous war crimes committed pursuant to the U.S. scenario for world domination.
					
					 For the U.S., the bio-chemical warfare is one of the major military scenarios to invade other countries and dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. has pushed ahead with the development of bio-chemical weapons for a long time and directed great efforts to researches into them and their production.
					
					 Since truce in Korea the U.S. has more frantically pushed forward the establishment of bio-chemical weapons system according to the hegemonic viewpoints of the chief executives that it should be rounded off in the light of political and military interests of the White House and should not be restricted by the international arms control mechanism.
					
					 The U.S. development of bio-chemical weapons is premised on their use and aimed at world domination. Hence, the U.S. plan for the development of bio-chemical weapons obviously assumes offensive nature.
					
					 U.S. "counter-terrorism" is an undisguised bio-chemical warfare being perpetrated by the U.S. worldwide under the pretext of coping with "bio-chemical threats". 
					
					 The U.S. is hyping "threats" from the DPRK in a bid to invade the DPRK located in the region of military and geopolitical importance in its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 Lurking behind the U.S. noisy trumpeting about the non-existent "bio-chemical threat" from the DPRK is a sinister intention to legalize its bio-chemical warfare under its pretext.
					
					 The ongoing U.S. moves to ignite a bio-chemical warfare are a grave human rights abuse against the international community and a hideous crime which deserves humankind's punishment.
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, an arch criminal manufacturing, stockpiling and proliferating WMDs. It is an empire of devils, chieftain of bio-chemical warfare and synonym for human rights abuses as it stoops to any move to exterminate other nations and countries in utter disregard of international law and world public opinion for realizing its ambition for aggression.
					
					 The moves stepped up by the U.S. for a war of aggression against the DPRK under the pretext of "nuclear and bio-chemical threats" would only compel the DPRK to further bolster up its capability for self-defence.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group persist in their moves for bio-chemical warfare, they will be held wholly accountable for all the ensuing consequences and will have to pay a dear price for them.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. and S. Korean Regime of Grave Consequences of Opening UN Office in Seoul
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Warns U.S. and S. Korean Regime of Grave Consequences of Opening UN Office in Seoul 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is noisily advertising that the UN "office for human rights performance in the north" will formally open in June.
					 The office is an illegal one fabricated by the puppet group in a bid to intentionally do harm to a sovereign state in wanton violation of the UN Charter and international law, pursuant to the U.S. scenario.
					
					 This is absolutely intolerable as it is a thrice-cursed politically- motivated provocation of the U.S. and the puppet group keen to defame the dignity and social system of the DPRK and realize their wild ambition for stifling it at any cost. 
					
					 Looking back on history, the U.S. has pulled up the countries incurring its displeasure over their human rights performance by setting in motion plot-breeding bodies going under the mask of the UN and perpetrated armed intervention and ignited wars of aggression against them under the pretext of "protecting human rights."
					
					 The purpose sought by the U.S. and the puppet group in establishing the office is to turn south Korea into a center for hatching plots over "human rights" and internationalize the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 The south Korean puppet conservative group has run the whole gamut of moves to build up world public opinion on "human rights in the north" and seek international cooperation in its anti-DPRK campaign as a shock force in its "human rights" campaign.
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea, since she took office, has never forgotten to mention the "issue of human rights performance in the north" during her trips to foreign countries and at 10 odd international conferences but has taken the lead in soliciting international cooperation in the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, talking about "generally accepted value" and "concern of international community."
					
					 When the establishment of the UN "office on human rights performance in the north" was proposed by the UN Human Rights Council last year, the puppet group frequently visited the UN high commissioner for Human Rights, asserting south Korea is fit for gathering "information" and "evidence" concerning the "issue of human rights performance in the north" as there are a lot of "defectors from the north" there.
					
					 The group went the lengths of galvanizing 17 anti-DPRK bodies including the south Korean "Citizens Alliance for Human Rights in North Korea" and conservative media into releasing a statement asserting that the UN office should not be set up in other countries except south Korea.
					
					  Not only the conservative forces including those of the Foreign Ministry, the Ministry of Unification and the "Saenuri Party" but the chief executive vociferated in the international arena about the need for south Korea to host the UN office. 
					
					 The projected inauguration of the office is lashing the service personnel and people of the DPRK into great fury as it is a serious hostile act of hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					  The army of Mt. Paektu will never overlook the opening of the office in Seoul.
					
					  The U.S. and the puppet group will have to pay dearly for the operation of the office.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Worst Lackeys of U.S. and Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korean Authorities Worst Lackeys of U.S. and Japan
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday in an article underlines the need for the north and the south to reject foreign forces from the viewpoint of By Our Nation Itself and resolve the issue of the inter-Korean relations independently in the common interests of the nation. 
					 The present puppet ruling forces have become increasingly dependent on outside forces and desperately pursued sycophancy and treachery quite contrary to the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, negating truth of history just as the Lee Myung Bak group of quislings did, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Present chief executive Park Geun Hye's sycophancy towards the U.S. and Japan has reached the worst phase in history. 
					
					 She is putting into the shade the preceding rulers who won ill-fame for toeing the U.S. line and meeting its interests.
					
					 She flew into the U.S. and implored its president to indefinitely extend OPECON. This was a revelation of her intention to keep the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea on a permanent basis and realize her ambition for invading the DPRK in reliance upon them.
					
					 After she took power, there took place in south Korea shocking events. Pro-Japanese elements, who let the history textbooks embellishing the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule pass through screening, were appointed to important posts in the history-related fields such as the chairman of the Committee for Compiling the National History.
					
					 Her flunkeyism and treachery plunged the inter-Korean relations into a bottomless abyss of catastrophe.
					
					 The above-said bad practices of the south Korean puppet forces only escalate the confrontation and distrust between the north and the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Moves to Escalate Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the south Korean puppet group held a tripartite consultative meeting with the chief negotiators of the U.S. and Japan to the six-party talks in Seoul. They were closeted over the issue of maintaining "close cooperation" to put "strong pressure" upon the DPRK and increase the "efficiency of sanctions" as a reaction to "the north's serious increase of nuclear capability." Meanwhile, they let loose rhetoric calling for "dynamism of the international community," trumpeting about the improvement of "human rights in the north" and the like. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the group of traitors has reached the worst phase in its moves to tighten a siege of political and military pressure and economic sanctions to the DPRK in collusion with outside forces and realize its ambition to stifle the DPRK come what may.
					
					 It is quite natural, therefore, for the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the prevailing serious situation.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can get something by ratcheting up the sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK through such cooperation with outside forces. 
					
					 The desperate efforts being made by the traitors in collusion with outside forces only harden the will of the DPRK to mercilessly meet the challenge of aggressors with the invincible military muscle of Songun Korea.  
					
					 The DPRK keeps tabs on all crimes committed by the puppet group of traitors, hell-bent on the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with outside forces. The moment is drawing near when the Park Geun Hye group will have to pay a very high price for them.

articles.title: S. Korean Army Stages War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korean Army Stages War Drills 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are fanning up anti-north war fever, according to the south Korean internet paper Newsis. 
					 The 8th Corps of the Ground Force, the First Fleet of the Navy and the 8th Combat Air Division of the south Korean puppet army staged joint strike drills by mobilizing all kinds of artillery pieces, warships and fighters in the coastal area of south Korean Kangwon Province on June 1. 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Air Operation Command and the 11th Division of the puppet Ground Force staged field tactical drills through air strike and fire from tanks with the involvement of offensive weapons including copters, tanks and armored cars at a firing range in Kyonggi Province. 
					
					 The test-fire of a ballistic missile, one of main parts of Kill Chain system for a preemptive attack on the DPRK, took place in the presence of the south Korean puppet chief executive at a firing range of the Defense Science Institute on Wednesday. 
					
					 All facts go to prove what the root cause of the war crisis on the Korean peninsula is.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Conniving at and Sheltering U.S. Criminal Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Accused of Conniving at and Sheltering U.S. Criminal Acts
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo in an editorial on June 1 lashed out at the U.S. for posing a threat to the life security of the south Korean people.
					 Owing to the U.S. introduction of anthrax germs, grudge is mounting among the south Korean people, it noted, adding:
					
					 The disclosure of anthrax germ experiment goes to clearly prove that the U.S. seeks to wage a bio-chemical war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the Park Geun Hye regime is conniving at and sheltering the U.S. crimes.
					
					 The Park regime should step down at an early date for the sake of the people's life security.
					
					 The editorial called for forcing the U.S. forces, the chief architect of the Korean division and the root cause of all crimes, to quit south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Carry on Actions in Demand of People's Life Security
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Carry on Actions in Demand of People's Life Security 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- 65 civic and public organizations of south Korea including the Solidarity for Progress, Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference before the Osan U.S. air force base on May 28 demanding the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the puppet group take measures for people's life security.
					 At the press conference, the speakers said that all the Koreans are shaking with resentment at the news that the U.S. forces introduced active anthrax germs into the Osan U.S. air force base.
					
					 The regime should revise the unequal SOFA and guarantee the people's life security, they urged.
					
					 The participants in the conference attempted to thrust a protest letter to the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressors present in south Korea, but they failed owing to the U.S. forces' crackdown.
					
					 Infuriated by this, they displayed the protest letter on barbed wire entanglements surrounding the base and demanded the U.S. forces and the puppet authorities guarantee the people's life security.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Slams Group of Traitors' Acts of Treachery
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Slams Group of Traitors' Acts of Treachery
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The People's Action for Peace against War of south Korea held a meeting near the U.S. forces base in Ryongsan, Seoul on May 30 in denunciation of the puppet group's acts of treachery.
					 At the meeting, the speakers accused the defence ministers of south Korea, the U.S. and Japan of contemplating holding talks that day to discuss THAAD deployment in south Korea and rearming of Japan.
					
					 They declared they could never pardon the present regime's scheme to introduce THAAD in collusion with the U.S. by defying the people's will and its act of seeking cooperation with Japan in a bid to help the latter realize its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 They urged Park Geun Hye to opt for improving the inter-Korean relations, instead of seeking closer alliance with the U.S. and Japan.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in foreign countries to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 Book-reading sessions were held in Denmark, Sweden and Finland and round-table talks in Ethiopia on May 27 and 29.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea, fathered by President Kim Il Sung, to meet the demand of the present times and developing revolution. 
					
					 The Songun politics formulated by Kim Jong Il as the main political mode under socialism is the ever-victorious banner helping defend the dignity of countries and nations and realize independence of the popular masses in the world today, he added. 
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK was a historic event of great significance. 
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea praised the undying feats he performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence, saying progressives of the world will always remember his noble life.

articles.title: Korean Films Shown in Iran
articles.content:
Korean Films Shown in Iran
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Film shows took place at the Diamond Company, IEI Company and EW Company of Iran from May 24 to 27 to mark the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 The participants watched Korean films including the "Masikryong Ski Resort." 
					
					 The manager of the Diamond Company said he came to know better about the popular policy of the WPK, the party's line of loving the younger generations, in particular, while enjoying the film introducing the Songdowon International Children's Camp which was excellently spruced up under the deep care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Noting that the "human rights issue in the DPRK" much touted by the U.S. and its followers is absolutely false, he hoped that the Korean people will achieve bigger successes in the building of an economic power under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The vice-managers of the IEI and EW Companies said that the Masikryong Ski Resort was wonderfully built under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un who is translating into a reality the intention of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the happy and highly civilized life of the people. They expressed their will to visit the ski resort.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Praised by Angolan Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party-building Feats Praised by Angolan Body
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The great exploits of leader Kim Jong Il for developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) will shine long generation after generation. 
					 The youth organization of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola said this in a statement on May 28. 
					
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, 1964 was of great significance in the history of the WPK. It went on:
					
					 He developed the Juche idea, the Songun idea, into the guiding idea in the era of independence and fully embodied it in all fields of the revolution and construction, turning the WPK into the ever-victorious party. 
					
					 Under the leadership of the WPK, the Korean people built a socialist power, resolutely smashing the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed in Guinea
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed in Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A lecture on the theme of "Torch kindled in Pochonbo" took place at Guinean Art College on May 25 under the sponsorship of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea on the occasion of the 78th anniversary of the victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Korea.
					 Present there were personages of the Society and the College and masses.
					
					 Abdoulaye Diallo, chairman of the Guinean Society for the Study of the Juche Literary Idea, said June 4 is a significant day in the history of the Songun revolution of the Korean people.
					
					 Citing in detail the fact that President Kim Il Sung organized the Pochonbo battle and led it to victory to inject new life and vitality into the Koreans in the days when the Japanese imperialists' rule over Korea was getting harsher, and the significance of the battle, the chairman continued:
					
					 The Korean people, following the President as the leader of the nation and savior of national resuscitation, were convinced of the day when he would surely bring about Korea's liberation.
					
					 The Korean people finally greeted the day of liberation on August 15, 1945.

articles.title: Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of North-South Joint Declaration Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries on May 23 and 26 to mark the 15th anniversary of the June 15th North-South Joint Declaration.
					 They included a seminar and photo exhibition sponsored by the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, a lecture and film show by the Guinean Ministry of Defense and round-table talks by a dental hospital in Ethiopia.
					
					 On display at the photo exhibition were photos documenting the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for national reunification and those showing Marshal Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership feats.
					
					 Shown at the film show was a Korean film dealing with the proud picture of the DPRK always emerging victorious by dint of the invincible single-minded unity. 
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy and other speakers said the June 15 joint declaration based on the idea of By Our Nation Itself serves as an eternal banner for Korea's reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Il performed gigantic exploits to go down forever in the history of the national reunification movement by bringing about a north-south summit for the first time in the history of Korea's division and made sure that the June 15 joint declaration, a milestone for Korea's reunification, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, were adopted, they said.

articles.title: U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Denounced by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket Denounced by Bulgarian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association in its bulletin on May 28 carried a commentary condemning the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK.
					 Citing fact that at the UN General Assembly session last year the U.S. instigated its followers to railroad "human rights resolution" against the DPRK, the commentary said:
					
					 Lurking behind this is the black-hearted intention of the U.S. to rid the world of socialist Korea.
					
					 The U.S. has pursued the policy of "strategic patience", saying it will wait till the DPRK scraps nuclear program and falls on its knees.
					
					 Despite such policy the military muscle of the DPRK is increasing day by day.
					
					 The U.S. is finding itself tight-cornered with the lapse of time.
					
					 That is why it is kicking up smear campaign over "human rights."

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced in Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced in Ecuador 
 Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Library and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador on May 26 posted on internet homepage the part dealing with reunification of Korea in supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address this year.

articles.title: Portavoz de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC denuncia lanzamiento de prueba de misil de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de fuerzas estrategicas de EPC denuncia lanzamiento de prueba de misil de Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 4 una declaracion denunciando el lanzamiento de prueba de misil realizado por la camarilla surcoreana de Park Geun-hye. 
					El pasado dia 3, la banda de Park Geun-hye desarrollo en el campo de tiro de Anhung de la peninsula de Thaean de la provincia de Chungchong del Sur el lanzamiento de prueba de misil apuntando directamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					La mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye y sus titeres Kim Kwan Jin, Han Min Gu y otros parlotean como si hubiera sido muy exitoso el lanzamiento de prueba de misil con 500km de alcance y agregaron que el misil surcoreano puede alcanzar toda la extension norcoreana y asi el Sur de Corea ha llegado a recuperar la "inferioridad militar sobre el Norte". 
					
					Esto es una parte de la actitud vendepatria y traidora de los titeres surcoreanos que arremeten a los connacionales con las bayonetas dadas por las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					En la larga historia de nuestra nacion no hubo la canalla tan malvada como Park Geun-hye, que al hacerse duena de Chongwadae, se entrega al enfrentamiento fratricida bajo el mando e instigacion de EE.UU.
					
					La situacion actual comprueba que son muy justas y clarividentes las medidas de la RPDC de fortalecer el disuasivo de autodefensa nacional segun la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					El disuasivo nuclear y el cohete estrategico de la RPDC no son para atacar al Sur de Corea, la mitad de nuestra patria donde viven los coterraneos. 
					
					Los blancos de nuestros medios de ataque de autodefensa son los imperialistas norteamericanos, -caudillos de agresion y de guerra y enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano- sus fuerzas satelites y un punado de traidores como Park Geun-hye. 
					
					Esta y sus compinches deben darse clara cuenta de que el disuasivo nuclear de nuestro ejercito y pueblo previene la guerra nuclear que pretende desatar EE.UU. y que nuestras fuerzas estrategicas capaces de convertir en el mar de fuego hasta el territorio estadounidense garantizan la dignidad y la seguridad de la nacion. 
					
					Los acostumbrados al servilismo pronorteamericano traicionan a la nacion y no sufriran nada mas que la muerte de perro. 
					
					Park Geun-hye y sus compinches no deben olvidar ni un momento que nuestras fuerzas estrategicas estan al frente del cumplimiento de las medidas del ejercito y pueblo coreanos por el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional.

articles.title: CRPP desenmascara la insistencia en dialogo de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP desenmascara la insistencia en dialogo de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria publico el dia 3 una declaracion denunciando las maniobras de los titeres surcoreanos tendentes a exacerbar la confrontacion fratricida.
					En estos dias, los titeres surcoreanos hablan ruidosamente del "dialogo", a diferencia de sus malas entranas, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Park Geun-hye suele soltar las calumnias al regimen de la parte connacional, y al mismo tiempo, dice que el Norte debe "sentarse cuanto antes ante la mesa de dialogo sin rechazar la mano tendida". De esta manera, trata de inducir en error la opinion publica como si el dialogo de autoridades intercoreanos no se reanudara por culpa del Norte.
					
					Sumandose a ella, Yun Pyong Se, Hong Yong Phyo y otros titeres orquestan la conspiracion anti-RPDC junto con sus amos norteamericanos y japoneses y abogan por la "induccion del Norte al dialogo" segun la "estrategia paralela de presion y dialogo".
					
					Tales actos no pasan de ser otra farsa politica de la banda de Park tendente a imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas, salir de la cada dia mas agravante crisis de gobernacion y exacerbar mas la confrontacion fratricida en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Es el climax del cinismo hablar del "dialogo" despues de haber roto el ambiente de la mejora de relaciones Norte-Sur, y abandonado las oportunidades del dialogo.
					
					Nadie prestara oidos a tales palabrerias de la banda de Park.
					
					Con tales sofisterias los titeres surcoreanos no podran eludir la responsabilidad de haber empeorado las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Si desean de veras el dialogo con la RPDC, deben tener primero la fisonomia elemental de contraparte de dialogo.
					
					Ante todo, deben tomar la posicion de resolver de manera independiente el problema de reunificacion con las fuerzas unidas de los connacionales y de reconocer y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas acordadas por las autoridades de ambas partes.
					
					Y deben abandonar la politica de confrontacion fratricida, sin obedecer a la politica hostil a la RPDC de Estados Unidos, y parar de inmediato los entrenamientos de guerra de agresion que agravan la situacion.
					
					Solo de esta manera, ellos tendran la calificacion como contraparte del dialogo y la cara de encontrarse con la RPDC.
					
					Observaremos atentamente no las palabras sino las acciones de la banda titere del Sur de Corea.

articles.title: Denuncian en RPDC incorporacion de banda surcoreana a guerra bioquimica de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Denuncian en RPDC incorporacion de banda surcoreana a guerra bioquimica de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- En una declaracion fechada 4, el portavoz de la Sociedad de Medidas de DDHH en el Sur de Corea denuncia el proceder grosero de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye que ampara las horrorosas maniobras norteamericanas para la provocacion de la guerra bioquimica anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, calificandolo de intolerable crimen antinacional y provocacion anti-RPDC y continua:
					Ya antes se iniciaron las maniobras criminales del imperio norteamericano encaminadas a sacrificar a la nacion coreana en la guerra bioquimica. 
					
					Desde verano de 2013, primer ano de mandato de la camarilla de Park Geun-hye, sirvienta pronorteamericana de categoria especial, EE.UU. introdujo en el suelo surcoreano enormes pertrechos de guerra bioquimica y las fuerzas armadas y desarrolla paralelamente junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios de guerra bioquimica y los de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC. 
					
					Ahora los partidos opositores y las entidades civiles y sociales de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea urgen al "gobierno" tomar las contramedidas inmediatas en cuanto a la introduccion de bacilos de antracosis. Pero, la banda de Park Geun-hye, complice de la guerra bioquimica de EE.UU., dice sin escrupulos que discutira este tema en la "reunion conjunta" con las tropas norteamericanas, prevista para julio que viene. 
					
					Tales hechos demuestran una vez mas claramente que mientras existan los invasores norteamericanos y su brigada de choque, camarilla de Park Geun-hye, la nacion coreana no puede defender la vida y la seguridad de la nacion ni eludir los desastres de la guerra nuclear y bioquimica.
					
					La camarilla de Park, que se entrega con frenesi a la provocacion de guerra bioquimica contra la parte connacional en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, sera condenada categoricamente por la nacion.

articles.title: ACNC condena maniobras de EE.UU. para provocar guerra bioquimica
articles.content:
ACNC condena maniobras de EE.UU. para provocar guerra bioquimica
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC)) publico el dia 4 un acta de acusacion intitulada "Condenamos las maniobras nefandas de EE.UU. para provocar la guerra bioquimica" reprochando a las tropas norteamericanas que hicieron recientemente el experimento de los bacilos de antracosis.
					La nota senala que el experimento de bacilos de antracosis de EE.UU. es una nueva provocacion politica contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el crimen intolerable que acarrea el nubarron de guerra bioquimica en la Peninsula Coreana y continua:
					
					El experimento de los bacilos de antracosis cometido en la base de las fuerzas aereas norteamericanas de Osan del Sur de Corea es el archi-crimen antietico encaminado a exterminar a la nacion coreana.
					
					Los bacilos de antracosis, reconocidos como "polvo blanco de pavor" y "arma diabolica", son armas mas mortiferas que otras biologicas y tienen el 95 por ciento de efectividad. 
					
					Estas armas causan las perdidas humanas y la contaminacion ambiental mas graves que otros agentes patogenos.
					
					Despreciando esta peligrosidad, EE.UU. introdujo y experimento a puertas cerradas en el suelo surcoreano los bacilos de antracosis que amenazan gravemente la vida de la humanidad.
					
					El imperio determino la Peninsula Coreana como primera zona de peligro de la guerra biologica para suponer la efectividad de los bacilos de antracosis y desde 1998 instalo en las bases militares norteamericanas en Osan, Ryongsan y Phyongthaek los institutos y otros establecimientos referentes por primera vez entre sus bases militares en ultramar.
					
					La prueba de los bacilos de antracosis perpetrada por las tropas norteamericanas en la base militar de Osan es la continuacion de la guerra biologica que EE.UU. realizo historicamente con el fin de exterminar a la nacion coreana.
					
					Durante la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. tomo la Peninsula Coreana como campo de experimento de armas bioquimicas y perpetro las horrorosas atrocidades de guerra biologica.
					
					Y utilizo sin vacilacion las armas quimicas prohibidas por la ley internacional.
					
					En el periodo de la pasada guerra coreana en la parte Norte de Corea fueron asesinados mas de un millon 230 mil habitantes por el bombardeo indiscriminado y la guerra bioquimica de los imperialistas norteamericanos. 
					
					Despues de la firma del Acuerdo de Armisticio, EE.UU. vino abultando su expediente criminal recurriendo a la guerra bioquimica contra la nacion coreana, debido a lo cual el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en la mayor colonia y mayor arsenal de armas bioquimicas en el mundo que permite a EE.UU. introducir a su antojo las armas nucleares y bioquimicas de todos tipos y cometer los experimentos con seres humanos. 
					
					El experimento de bacilos de antracosis en el Sur de Corea es el archi-crimen de guerra que se comete segun la ambicion de hegemonia mundial de la Casa Blanca.
					
					Para EE.UU. la guerra bioquimica es una de las principales operaciones militares para agredir a otros paises y tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Ya desde hace mucho tiempo, el imperio vino concentrando sus fuerzas en el desarrollo, estudio y produccion de armas bioquimicas. 
					
					Despues de la guerra coreana, EE.UU. instala en gran escala el sistema de armas bioquimicas segun el criterio hegemonico de sus gobernantes de perfeccionarlo conforme a los intereses politicos y militares de la Casa Blanca y sin restriccion alguna del sistema internacional de control de armas. 
					
					El desarrollo de armas bioquimicas de EE.UU. toma por premisa el uso de esos armamentos mortiferos y es para tomar la hegemonia mundial. Pues, el plan de desarrollo de armas bioquimicas norteamericanas reviste el caracter ofensivo. 
					
					La "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU. es la provocacion de la guerra bioquimica que se comete abiertamente en la palestra internacional bajo el rotulo de hacer frente a la "amenaza bioquimica".
					
					EE.UU. difunde el rumor de "amenaza" de la RPDC a fin de agredir a ella que esta situada en la posicion muy importante en lo politico, militar y geopolitico. 
					
					Habla tan ruidosamente de la inexistente "amenaza bioquimica" de la RPDC con el designio malintencionado de justificar la guerra bioquimica, considerada como metodo eficiente para la realizacion de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial.
					
					Las maniobras norteamericanas tendentes a desatar la guerra bioquimica devienen la exterminacion de derechos humanos en la sociedad internacional y el crimen de categoria especial a ser liquidado sin falta por la humanidad. 
					
					EE.UU. es el autor de la produccion, posesion y proliferacion de armas de exterminio masivo, el imperio de malos, criminal de guerra bioquimica y pronombre de la violacion de los derechos humanos que no vacila en exterminar a otras naciones y paises sin tener en cuenta la ley internacional ni la opinion publica mundial para satisfacer su ambicion agresiva. 
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. intensifique las maniobras de guerra de agresion anti-RPDC pretextando la "amenaza nuclear y bioquimica", mas consolidaremos la capacidad de autodefensa nacional.
					
					Si EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos siguen recurriendo a las maniobras de provocacion de la guerra bioquimica, se responsabilizaran de todas las consecuencias y pagaran muy caro por su crimen.

articles.title: Iniciada construccion de ferrocarril de zona de Samjiyon
articles.content:
Iniciada construccion de ferrocarril de zona de Samjiyon
Samjiyon, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- Se construira la ancha ferrovia Hyesan-Samjiyon de Corea.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la explanada frente al Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon la ceremonia de comienzo de la obra del ferrocarril de la zona de Samjiyon.
					
					Estuvieron presentes el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong, los funcionarios de la rama interesada, los constructores y los trabajadores del distrito de Samjiyon.
					
					Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung tras depositar ramos de flores ante su estatua de bronce erguida en el Conjunto Monumental de Samjiyon.
					
					En la ceremonia de inicio de la obra, hubo el informe de O Su Yong e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que la construccion del ferrocarril de la zona de Samjiyon es la obra sagrada para glorificar para siempre la vida revolucionaria de los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y sus hazanas impregnadas en la tierra de Paektu.
					
					Ellos exhortaron a concluir la obra a tiempo superando todas las dificultades.
